scripts.clean: concurrently -i -c green,blue -n core,react 'cd core && npm run clean' 'cd react && npm run clean'
scripts.dev: concurrently -i -c green,blue,yellow -n core,react,react-example 'cd core && npm run build:watch' 'cd react && npm run build:watch' 'cd react-example && npm run dev'
scripts.build: cd core && npm run build && cd ../react && npm run build
scripts.check: concurrently -i -c green,blue -n lint,prettier 'npm run lint' 'npm run prettier'
